q1.answer: Yes! The Free tier is completely free forever with basic features. Upgrade anytime for more capabilities.
q1.question: Is there really a free plan?

q2.answer: Yes! Annual billing saves you approximately 17% compared to monthly billing.
q2.question: Do I save money with annual billing?

q3.answer: Each workspace has its own plan. Paid plans are billed per user within that workspace. You can have different plans for different workspaces. Every account gets up to 10 free workspaces—additional workspaces require a paid plan.
q3.question: How does per-workspace pricing work?

education.bento_grid_description: Access thousands of curated educational resources, textbooks, and multimedia content.
education.description: Empower educators and students with intelligent tools for personalized learning, seamless collaboration, and enhanced educational outcomes.

faq.answer1: Our AI system analyzes student performance, learning patterns, and engagement levels to create personalized learning paths. It adapts in real-time to provide optimal content delivery and support.
faq.answer2: We implement enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with FERPA and GDPR requirements to ensure student data protection.
faq.answer3: Yes, our platform offers robust API integration capabilities and supports common education technology standards for seamless integration with existing systems.
faq.answer4: We provide 24/7 technical support, dedicated customer success managers, and comprehensive onboarding assistance. Our team also offers regular training sessions and educational webinars.
faq.answer5: The platform is highly customizable with white-labeling options, custom branding, configurable workflows, and API integrations. You can tailor the learning experience to match your institution's needs.
faq.answer6: Our cloud-based platform works on any modern web browser. For optimal video conferencing, we recommend a stable internet connection and updated devices with camera and microphone capabilities.
faq.answer7: We maintain automated daily backups with 30-day retention, geo-redundant storage, and disaster recovery protocols. Your data is always safe and accessible.
faq.question1: How does the AI-powered learning system work?
faq.question2: What security measures are in place?
faq.question3: Can it integrate with existing systems?
faq.question4: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.question7: How do you handle data backup?

community.description: From RMIT NEO Culture Technology Club to the world, creating opportunities for passionate people everywhere
community.title: Empowering the Community

founding.description: Nguyen Pham Anh Thu joined as our first software engineer, bringing talent and passion that set the tone for everything we'd build
founding.title: Our First Contributor

growth.description: Vo Khanh Quynh became our first COO and Nguyen Ha Gia Tam our first People & Operations Coordinator, building our leadership team
growth.title: Women-Led Foundation

mentorship.description: Started mentoring female coworkers internally, helping them unlock their potential and achieve bigger things together
mentorship.title: Growing Together

achievements.subtitle: The incredible women who've shaped Tuturuuu from the start
achievements.title: Our Journey Together

message.closing: To Thu, Quynh, Tam, Sophie, Sweet, Tien, and every woman who's been part of our journey: thank you for being more than colleagues. You're the reason Tuturuuu exists.
message.paragraph1: When we started Tuturuuu, I dreamed of building technology with people I trust - friends, mentors, and passionate builders. What makes me most proud is that women have been leading this journey from day one, not as employees, but as friends, partners, and pioneers.
message.paragraph2: Thu, my peer and the first engineer at Tuturuuu aside from me, believed in this crazy idea when it was just a dream. Quynh, who became the first COO of Tuturuuu and mentor to all of us, helped shape what Tuturuuu could become. Tam, younger but equally brilliant, became our first People & Operations Coordinator and built our people operations from nothing. They're not just teammates - they're family.
message.paragraph3: Today, we build alongside Sophie and Sweet, the amazing women founders of AllMind who are on the same journey. Tien, from SPARK Hub, opened doors we didn't know existed - connecting us with incredible people, giving us space to innovate together, and believing in us when we needed it most. From RMIT students to global partnerships, every connection has made us stronger.
message.paragraph4: This isn't just about business - it's about friends supporting friends, mentors lifting up the next generation, and people from everywhere coming together to build something meaningful. If you're passionate about technology and want to be part of a family that builds together, we're here.

ceo.messageTitle: Building Together: From Friends to a Global Movement
ceo.name: Vo Hoang Phuc
ceo.title: Founder & CEO

cta.description: We're always looking for passionate people who want to make a real impact. If you love technology and want to work with a team that truly values each other. Let's talk!
cta.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together

global.description: From collaborations with women in tech across Asia to partnerships that span continents, we're proving that Vietnamese innovation can lead on the global stage. Our network grows stronger every day.
global.title: Connected Globally

globalImpact.subtitle: Building bridges and creating opportunities across borders
globalImpact.title: From Vietnam to the World

vietnam.description: Our journey started in Vietnam with a vision to empower the next generation of technologists. Through partnerships with RMIT NEO Culture Technology Club and local communities, we're nurturing talent right here at home.
vietnam.title: Rooted in Vietnam

hero.description: At every step of our journey, from our first contributor to our executive team, from local partnerships to global collaborations. Women have been leading, building, and inspiring. This is how we're creating the future together.

growth.description: Gender-diverse teams are twice as likely to meet or exceed financial targets
growth.subtitle: Team Performance
growth.title: 2x

innovation.description: Companies with diverse teams produce 19% more revenue from innovation and solve problems 35% faster
innovation.subtitle: More Innovation

leadership.description: Teams with women in leadership roles make better business decisions up to 50% of the time

impact.subtitle: Celebrating the incredible impact women make in the tech industry every day

vietnameseWomensDay.languageAvailable: This page is available in English and Vietnamese

maleColleagues.groupPhotoAlt: Male colleagues at Tuturuuu celebrating Vietnamese Women's Day
maleColleagues.subtitle: Our male colleagues celebrate the incredible women who make Tuturuuu extraordinary
maleColleagues.title: Messages from Our Brothers

henry.message: Working alongside such brilliant women has been the greatest privilege of my career. Your dedication, creativity, and resilience inspire me every single day. Here's to breaking barriers, shattering ceilings, and proving that the future of technology is diverse, inclusive, and unstoppable.
henry.name: Henry

khang.message: As someone still learning and growing, I'm incredibly grateful to work with women who lead with both excellence and compassion. You've shown me that success isn't about competing, it's about lifting each other up. Thank you for being incredible mentors and role models.
khang.name: Khang

khoi.message: To the women who welcomed me, mentored me, and believed in my potential, thank you. You've created a space where everyone can thrive, regardless of gender or background. I'm honored to learn from leaders who are shaping not just products, but the entire industry's future.
khoi.name: Khoi

phuc.message: To all the incredible women at Tuturuuu, thank you for teaching me what true leadership means. You've shown me that strength comes not from authority, but from empathy, vision, and unwavering belief in each other. You're not just building a company, you're shaping the future of tech in Vietnam and beyond.
phuc.name: Phuc

sam.message: Since the day I started at Tuturuuu, I was overwhelmed by the amount of support I received by the women at our team. This spirit of collaboration and encouragement extends across the entire company. I am constantly inspired by the talent, resilience, and leadership demonstrated by women in every department. You are mentors, problem-solvers, and the driving force behind so much of our success. Thank you to all the incredible women at Tuturuuu for your invaluable contributions and for fostering such a positive and empowering environment.
sam.name: Sam

allmind.description: Sophie and Sweet (Thư and Ngọc in Vietnamese), the amazing founders of AllMind, have been incredible neighbor-startups. They appreciate how Tuturuuu is always helpful and always there for everyone, not just those who needed help. Together, we're building an ecosystem where everyone supports each other, no matter who you are.
allmind.title: AllMind: Sophie & Sweet

community.description: From RMIT students to global tech communities, from local meetups to international connections. We're building a family that supports each other across borders.
community.title: NCT: Growing Together

dai.description: Đài, Head of Organizing Committee for RMIT Business Analytics Champion Season 6 (2025) from RMIT Analytics Club, coordinated the successful execution of this pioneering data analytics competition. Her leadership in refining the competition structure and ensuring smooth operations showcased how students can lead meaningful initiatives that bridge academia and industry.
dai.title: Đài: Leading RBAC Forward

nhu.description: Như, Project Assistant for RMIT Business Analytics Champion Season 6 (2025) from RMIT Analytics Club, was instrumental in coordinating the development and refinement of rbac.vn. Her dedication and attention to detail ensured the website met the needs of both participants and organizers, demonstrating how collaboration creates excellence.
nhu.title: Như: Project Excellence

nhung.description: Nhung, Associate Software Engineer from Tuturuuu and dedicated open-source contributor, designed and developed rbac.vn for RMIT Business Analytics Champion Season 6 (2025). Her technical excellence and commitment to community-driven innovation powered the website that connects students with real-world data analytics challenges. Working alongside the RMIT Analytics Club team, she brought Tuturuuu's vision of empowering students through technology to life.
nhung.title: Nhung: Building rbac.vn

rmit.description: Professor Iwona Miliszewska, Dean of SSET, led the Poznań trip initiative that changed our perspective. Hoa, Manager of External Engagement & Events at SSET, and Nguyên, Senior Coordinator of Academic Advisory and Planning, helped engineers in SSET (School of Science, Engineering & Technology) access incredible opportunities to go abroad, like the International Strategic Management Workshop in Poznań, Poland at Poznań University of Technology (PUT). They believed in students' potential and opened doors to global experiences that shaped our worldview.
rmit.title: RMIT: Opening Doors to the World

soki.description: Kim, founder of SOKI, another women-led startup and wonderful neighbor at SPARK Hub, helped Tuturuuu expand its network through strategic collaborations with RMIT RISE Club. She's building her own vision while helping others grow theirs, showing what true community looks like.
soki.title: SOKI: Strategic Collaborations

sparkHub.description: Tien, SPARK Hub's program coordinator, gave us more than co-working space. She gave us opportunities, connections, and belief when we needed it most. She's been a mentor, connector, and champion for everyone at Tuturuuu.
sparkHub.quote: Knowing individuals like you is the reason why I love my job. I am grateful to have you and Tuturuuu here.
sparkHub.title: SPARK Hub: A new spark

engineering.name: Nguyen Pham Anh Thu & Our Engineering Team
engineering.roles: First Engineer at Tuturuuu · Platform Engineers · Technical Leaders
engineering.story: Thu, my peer and the first engineer at Tuturuuu aside from me, took a chance on this wild idea. From her to our robotics engineering interns, the women on our technical team aren't just colleagues. They're friends building the future together, one line of code at a time.
engineering.title: Peers & Innovators

executives.name: Vo Khanh Quynh & Nguyen Ha Gia Tam
executives.roles: First COO of Tuturuuu · First People & Operations Coordinator of Tuturuuu
executives.story: Quynh, our mentor and the first COO of Tuturuuu, showed us what leadership really means - not managing, but empowering. Tam, younger but equally visionary, became our first People & Operations Coordinator and built our people operations from scratch. Together, they created a culture where everyone feels like family.
executives.title: Mentors & Builders

marketing.name: Our Marketing Leaders
marketing.story: Our marketing team understands something special: technology is about people. They tell our authentic stories, connect us with the world, and build a community that feels like home.
marketing.title: Storytellers & Connectors

remote.name: Linh Dan & Our Remote Team
remote.roles: First Remote Software Engineer Intern · Global Team
remote.story: Linh Dan, our first remote women software engineer intern, proved something powerful: talent knows no borders. Now we're building a global family where passionate people from anywhere can come together and create something meaningful.
remote.title: No Borders, Just Passion
